articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta calls the video assistant referee's decision to allow Newcastle's goal in their 1-0 win "embarrassing" and a "disgrace".
articles.title: 'Sick' Arteta fumes at Newcastle VAR goal 'disgrace'

articles.description: England's swagger has gone over the past four weeks as Australia happily strike the final blow to their World Cup defence in Ahmedabad.
articles.title: 'More misery heaped on prickly and subdued England'

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen enjoys a comfortable victory in the Sao Paulo Grand Prix sprint race after passing Lando Norris at the start.
articles.title: Verstappen wins Sao Paulo sprint race from Norris

articles.description: Emma Hayes will go down as one of Chelsea's greatest managers when she leaves the club at the end of the season - and her role in helping grow the Women's Super League must not be forgotten.
articles.title: Why departing Hayes' WSL legacy goes beyond trophies

articles.description: The home of FA Cup Video on BBC Sport online. Includes the latest news stories, results, fixtures, video and audio.
articles.title: FA Cup Video highlights - BBC Sport

articles.description: Harry Kane's incredible start to life at Bayern Munich continues with his third Bundesliga hat-trick in an impressive win at Borussia Dortmund.
articles.title: Kane hits hat-trick in big Bayern win at Dortmund

articles.description: Jeremy Doku produces a sparkling performance as Manchester City move top of the Premier League by thrashing Bournemouth at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Doku shines as Man City thrash Bournemouth to go top

articles.description: A breakaway goal from Bojan Miovski fires 10-man Aberdeeen into the Viaplay cup final as Hibs fail to take their chances at Hampden
articles.title: Miovski sends 10-man Aberdeen to final at Hibs' expense

articles.description: Wales head coach Warren Gatland sets his sights on the Six Nations and praises the "incredible" service of three retiring greats after beating the Barbarians in Cardiff.
articles.title: Gatland looks to future after Wales stars' farewell

articles.description: Joe Cordina successfully defends his IBF super-featherweight title with a hard-fought majority decision victory over Edward Vazquez in Monte Carlo.
articles.title: Cordina retains title with majority decision win
